metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14653 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: The Gluster file system through versions 4.1.4 and 3.12 is vulnerable to aheap-based buffer overflow in the '__server_getspec' function via the'gf_getspec_req' RPC message. A remote authenticated attacker could exploitthis to cause a denial of service or other potential unspecified impact.

criterions.comment: glusterfs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
